Enumeration# AccessibilityEvents

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS

```
enum AccessibilityEvents
```

## [Topics](/documentation/RealityKit/AccessibilityEvents#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/RealityKit/AccessibilityEvents#Structures)

[`struct Activate`](/documentation/realitykit/accessibilityevents/activate)An accessibility event for activating an accessibility element.[`struct CustomAction`](/documentation/realitykit/accessibilityevents/customaction)An accessibility event for a custom action defined in your app.[`struct Decrement`](/documentation/realitykit/accessibilityevents/decrement)An accessibility event for decrementing an accessibility element.[`struct Increment`](/documentation/realitykit/accessibilityevents/increment)An accessibility event for incrementing an accessibility element.[`struct RotorNavigation`](/documentation/realitykit/accessibilityevents/rotornavigation)An accessibility event associated with a rotor navigation.## [See Also](/documentation/RealityKit/AccessibilityEvents#see-also)

### [Input and interaction events](/documentation/RealityKit/AccessibilityEvents#Input-and-interaction-events)

[`enum ManipulationEvents`](/documentation/realitykit/manipulationevents)Events that occur while a person manipulates an entity.
